Package org.hps.test.it

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClustererTest
    This test performs basic sanity checks on the output from the various clustering algorithms, and it creates an AIDA file with some useful plots, as well as optionally writes an LCIO file with the event data plus the clusters.
    ClustererTest.ClusterCheckDriver
    Driver that performs test assertions on Cluster collections.
    ClustererTest.ClustererTestConfig  
    ClustererTest.ClusterPlotsDriver
    This Driver produces some QA plots for each Clusterer in its own output AIDA dir within the plot tree.
    ConditionsIT
    Test the conditions system using various job and data configurations.
    DataQualityMonitorTest
    Test package for data quality monitoring of reconstructed data
    EcalSimReconTest
    Run readout simulation and full 2015 Engineering Run reconstruction on ECal MC input data and then check histograms of cluster data.
    EcalSimReconTest.EcalSimReconCheckDriver
    Driver for checking test output.
    EngRun2015FeeReconTest
    Test FEE recon for 2015 engineering run
    EngRun2015FeeReconTest.PlotDriver  
    EngRun2015MollerReconTest
    Test Moller reconstruction for 2015 engineering run
    EngRun2015MollerReconTest.PlotDriver  
    EngRun2015V0ReconTest
    Test V0 recon for 2015 engineering run
    EngRun2015V0ReconTest.PlotDriver  
    EvioToLcioTest
    Basic test of converting EVIO to LCIO using the EvioToLcio command line utility on Engineering Run 2015 data.
    HodoscopeDataConverterTest  
    HodoscopeReadoutTest
    Integration test for running filtering and readout on simulated Hodoscope data and creating plots from the final readout data.
    HodoscopeSimDataTest  
    PhysRun2016FeeReconTest
    Test FEE reconstruction for 2016 physics run
    PhysRun2016FeeReconTest.PlotDriver  
    PhysRun2016MollerReconTest
    Test Moller reconstruction for 2016 physics run
    PhysRun2016MollerReconTest.PlotDriver  
    PhysRun2016V0ReconTest
    Test V0 reconstruction for 2016 physics run
    PhysRun2016V0ReconTest.PlotDriver  
    PhysRun2019ReconTest
    Runs the 2019 reconstruction
    ReconTest
    Base class for reconstruction ITs This class downloads a test EVIO input file, runs reconstruction, generates test histograms, and compares them against a reference file.
    RefDriver
    Driver to be extended that writes reference plots
